Question: This person was nominated for an Emmy Award thirteen times, and won four times.
Hints: During this time this person taught a thirty-two week comedy workshop at the Brandeis-Bardin Institute.
In 1977, this person was among the first recipients of the Women in Film Crystal Award.
This person's film career spanned the 1930s and 1940s, and she became a television star during the 1950s.
